div.div: Bethel University vs. Saint John's Univ.

tr.td: Bethel won the toss and defers, SJU will receive at the North endzone.
A. O'Reilly kickoff 57 yards to the SJU08, Andrew Norri return 16 yards to the SJU24 (Daniel Leidall).
Jakob Certeza rush for 7 yards to the SJU31, out-of-bounds (Seth Mathis).
Connor Bruns rush for 4 yards to the SJU35 (Seth Mathis).
Connor Bruns pass complete to Josh Bungum for 3 yards to the SJU38 (Kevin Flaherty; Seth Mathis).
Jakob Certeza rush for 5 yards to the SJU43 (Landon Mathis).
Connor Bruns pass incomplete to Josh Bungum (Luke Buttenhoff).
Griffin Toomey punt 21 yards to the BU36, downed.
Erik Peterson pass incomplete to Ben Price, dropped pass.
B. Marquardt rush for 1 yard to the BU37 (Paul Plombon; Andrew Rose).
Erik Peterson pass complete to Mitch Hallstrom for 63 yards to the SJU00, TOUCHDOWN, clock 11:56.
